page.title: 17LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: AS IN OTHER AREAS,THERE ARE FOUR TIERS OF PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION. LOCAL RESIDENTS CAN BE ELECTED TO THE COMMUNITY,BOROUGH AND COUNTY COUNCILS WHICH DEAL WITH THE MORE LOCAL ISSUES WHILST NEATH RETURNS AN M.P TO PARLIAMENT MR DONALD COLEMAN LABOUR WHO RESIDES WITHIN THE SERVEYED AREA ON PENY-WERN HILL.THE AREA INCORPORATES THE PARISHES OF DYFFRYN CLYDACH AND BLAENHONDDAN WHICH INCLUDES THE VILLAGES OF CADOXTON AND BRYNCOCH.COMMUNITY COUNCILS HOLD THEIR MEETINGS IN THEIR OWN VILLAGES.BOROUGH COUNCILS MEET AT THE NEATH CIVIC CENTRE WHILST THE COUNTY COUNCIL MEETS AT THE NEW COUNTY HALL SWANSEA.
